entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %

Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
